updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent

originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:context=".Trips" android:minHeight="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutBack" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnBack" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt" android:text="Back" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textSize="18sp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnDebugShowAll" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt" android:text="Show All Trips" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginStart="10dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnDebugInsertTest" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt" android:text="Insert Test Trip" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginStart="10dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textNoTrips" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_bold" android:text="No trips found" android:textSize="18sp" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/layoutBack" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerTrips" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:minHeight="400dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/layoutBack" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" android:padding="16dp" tools:listitem="@layout/item_trip"/>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:context=".Trips" android:minHeight="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutBack" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnBack" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt" android:text="Back" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textSize="18sp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnDebugShowAll" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt" android:text="Show All Trips" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginStart="10dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnDebugInsertTest" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt" android:text="Insert Test Trip" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginStart="10dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textNoTrips" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_bold" android:text="No trips found" android:textSize="18sp" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/layoutBack" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerTrips" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:minHeight="400dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/layoutBack" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" android:padding="16dp" tools:listitem="@layout/item_trip"/>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!--<LinearLayout--> <!-- android:layout_width="match_parent"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:orientation="vertical">--> <!-- --> <!-- --> <!--</LinearLayout>-->
<ScrollView android:id="@+id/scrollView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" >
<TextView android:id="@+id/galleryHeader" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp" android:text="Plan a Trip" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_bold" android:textSize="24sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutEdits" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginTop="30dp" android:paddingHorizontal="30dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/galleryHeader">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutDestination" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:hint="Destination" android:layout_marginBottom="15dp" >
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtDestination" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" android:padding="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="15dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutDateStart" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:hint="Start Date" android:layout_weight="1">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtDateStart" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:gravity="center" android:clickable="true" android:textSize="15sp" android:focusable="false" android:inputType="none"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:text="to" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginHorizontal="20dp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_weight="0.5"/>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutDateEnd" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:hint="End Date" android:layout_weight="1">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtDateEnd" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:gravity="center" android:textSize="15sp" android:focusable="false" android:clickable="true" android:inputType="none"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select activities:" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_bold" android:textSize="16sp" />
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkHiking" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="30dp" android:text="Hiking"/>
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkBus" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="30dp" android:text="Bus ride"/>
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkSightseeing" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="30dp" android:text="Sightseeing"/>
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkMuseum" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="30dp" android:text="Museum"/>
</LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutTravelExpenses" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:hint="Travel Expenses" >
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtTripExpenses" android:layout_width="150dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:paddingVertical="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutNotes" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Trip notes" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_marginVertical="10dp" >
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:gravity="top|start" android:scrollHorizontally="false" android:id="@+id/edtNotes" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minLines="1" android:maxLines="5" android:overScrollMode="ifContentScrolls" android:scrollbars="vertical" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:padding="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutCustomExpenses" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="10dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Custom Expenses" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtCustomExpenses" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:padding="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutMealExpenses" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="10dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Meal Expenses" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtMealExpenses" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:padding="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText--> <!-- android:id="@+id/edtMealExpenses"--> <!-- android:layout_width="0dp"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"-->
<!-- android:background="@drawable/edittext_home"--> <!-- android:hint="Meal Expenses"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light"--> <!-- android:inputType="number"--> <!-- android:layout_weight="1"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="10dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="10dp"--> <!-- android:padding="10dp"--> <!-- android:textSize="15sp"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/black"--> <!-- />-->
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textEstimates" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="30dp" android:layout_marginVertical="10dp" android:text="Travel expenses - $ \nActivity expenses - $ \nCustom expenses - $ \nMeal expenses - $ \n --------------------- \nTotal estimated cost - $"
app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/layoutButtons" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/layoutEdits"/>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutButtons" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingHorizontal="30dp" android:layout_marginTop="30dp"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textEstimates">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnCalculate" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:textAllCaps="false" android:text="Calculate" android:layout_weight="1"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textEstimates"/>
<Space android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnSave" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:enabled="false" android:textAllCaps="false" android:text="Save" android:layout_weight="1"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/btnCalculate"/> </LinearLayout>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!--<LinearLayout--> <!-- android:layout_width="match_parent"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:orientation="vertical">--> <!-- --> <!-- --> <!--</LinearLayout>-->
<ScrollView android:id="@+id/scrollView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" >
<TextView android:id="@+id/galleryHeader" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp" android:text="Plan a Trip" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_bold" android:textSize="24sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutEdits" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginTop="30dp" android:paddingHorizontal="30dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/galleryHeader">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutDestination" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:hint="Destination" android:layout_marginBottom="15dp" >
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtDestination" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" android:padding="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="15dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutDateStart" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:hint="Start Date" android:layout_weight="1">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtDateStart" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:gravity="center" android:clickable="true" android:textSize="15sp" android:focusable="false" android:inputType="none"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:text="to" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginHorizontal="20dp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_weight="0.5"/>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutDateEnd" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:hint="End Date" android:layout_weight="1">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtDateEnd" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:gravity="center" android:textSize="15sp" android:focusable="false" android:clickable="true" android:inputType="none"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="50dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select activities:" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_bold" android:textSize="16sp" />
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkHiking" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="30dp" android:text="Hiking"/>
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkBus" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="30dp" android:text="Bus ride"/>
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkSightseeing" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="30dp" android:text="Sightseeing"/>
<CheckBox android:id="@+id/checkMuseum" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="30dp" android:text="Museum"/>
</LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutTravelExpenses" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:hint="Travel Expenses" >
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtTripExpenses" android:layout_width="150dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:paddingVertical="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutNotes" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Trip notes" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" android:layout_marginVertical="10dp" >
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:gravity="top|start" android:scrollHorizontally="false" android:id="@+id/edtNotes" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minLines="1" android:maxLines="5" android:overScrollMode="ifContentScrolls" android:scrollbars="vertical" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:padding="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutCustomExpenses" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="10dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Custom Expenses" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtCustomExpenses" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:padding="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/inputLayoutMealExpenses" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="10dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Meal Expenses" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/edtMealExpenses" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/edittext_home" android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:padding="10dp" android:textSize="15sp" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText--> <!-- android:id="@+id/edtMealExpenses"--> <!-- android:layout_width="0dp"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"-->
<!-- android:background="@drawable/edittext_home"--> <!-- android:hint="Meal Expenses"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="@font/inter_18pt_light"--> <!-- android:inputType="number"--> <!-- android:layout_weight="1"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="10dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="10dp"--> <!-- android:padding="10dp"--> <!-- android:textSize="15sp"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/black"--> <!-- />-->
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textEstimates" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="30dp" android:layout_marginVertical="10dp" android:text="Travel expenses - $ \nActivity expenses - $ \nCustom expenses - $ \nMeal expenses - $ \n --------------------- \nTotal estimated cost - $"
app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/layoutButtons" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/layoutEdits"/>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutButtons" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingHorizontal="30dp" android:layout_marginTop="30dp"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textEstimates">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnCalculate" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:textAllCaps="false" android:text="Calculate" android:layout_weight="1"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textEstimates"/>
<Space android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnSave" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:enabled="false" android:textAllCaps="false" android:text="Save" android:layout_weight="1"
app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/btnCalculate"/> </LinearLayout>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imageMemory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="120dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:background="@color/gray_300" android:contentDescription="Memory Image" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/textMemoryTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Memory Title" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:maxLines="1" android:ellipsize="end"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textMemoryDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Date" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/gray_600" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textMemoryDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Description" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iconMusic" android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_media_play" android:visibility="gone" android:contentDescription="Has Audio"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textHasAudio" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Audio" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/gray_600" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:visibility="gone"/>
<Space android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1"/>
<!-- Audio Control Buttons --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnPlay" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_media_play" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:contentDescription="Play Audio" android:visibility="gone" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="4dp"/>
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnPause" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_media_pause" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:contentDescription="Pause Audio" android:visibility="gone" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="4dp"/>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="4dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imageMemory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="120dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:background="@color/gray_300" android:contentDescription="Memory Image" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/textMemoryTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Memory Title" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:maxLines="1" android:ellipsize="end"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textMemoryDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Date" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/gray_600" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textMemoryDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Description" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iconMusic" android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_media_play" android:visibility="gone" android:contentDescription="Has Audio"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textHasAudio" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Audio" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/gray_600" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:visibility="gone"/>
<Space android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1"/>
<!-- Audio Control Buttons --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnPlay" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_media_play" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:contentDescription="Play Audio" android:visibility="gone" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="4dp"/>
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnPause" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_media_pause" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:contentDescription="Pause Audio" android:visibility="gone" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="4dp"/>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/textDestination" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Destination" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/black"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textDates" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Dates" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textActivities" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Activities" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textExpenses" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Expenses" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/>
<!-- Discount Information Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutDiscount" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:padding="8dp" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:visibility="gone">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textDiscount" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="10% Discount Applied!" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textDiscountAmount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="R 250.00" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white"/>
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textNotes" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Notes" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/textDestination" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Destination" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/black"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textDates" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Dates" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textActivities" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Activities" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textExpenses" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Expenses" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/>
<!-- Discount Information Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutDiscount" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:padding="8dp" android:background="@drawable/button_shape" android:visibility="gone">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textDiscount" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="10% Discount Applied!" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textDiscountAmount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="R 250.00" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white"/>
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textNotes" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Notes" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/black" android:layout_marginTop="4dp"/> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
